short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best art wallpaper images with our extension!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing ArtNewTabs, a captivating Chrome extension available on the Web Store. Immerse yourself in a world of artistic beauty every time you open a new tab. With ArtNewTabs, you'll discover a curated collection of stunning art wallpapers that inspire and captivate your imagination. From timeless classics to contemporary masterpieces, each image is carefully selected to transform your browsing experience into an artistic journey. Let ArtNewTabs infuse your day with creativity and aesthetic pleasure as you explore the web.

All images are sourced from Unsplash.com with a commercial license

By clicking “ADD TO CHROME”, you accept and agree to install the Art New tabs extension and setting Chrome new tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in our Terms of use and Privacy policy 

Privacy Policy: https://mobitech.io/pp
Terms of Use: https://mobitech.io/toc.html

 
You may uninstall the extension at any time
To remove our extension from Google Chrome:

1) Click on the three vertical dots icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser
2) Go to "Settings"
3) In the left menu that appears, click on "Extensions"
4) From the list of installed Extensions, locate the extension you would like to uninstall
